content:
I'm trying to explain "descent" here. That's one of many topics in category theory that looks more intimidating than it actually is. So, please ask questions!

I will try to stay on track. I'm gonna start out easy and then focus on some examples I have in mind. I will not be going in the most abstract direction.
i think i've heard it generalizes the sheaf condition?
When I said "here", I meant here. So, ask there.
